prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation. Supports <<<image_1>>>, <<<video_1>>> template references. Max 2500 characters.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Video duration in seconds (3-15). Ignored for video editing (base).

end_image.title: End Image
end_image.description: Last frame image. Requires start_image. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png, max 10MB, min 300px.

start_image.title: Start Image
start_image.description: First frame image. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png, max 10MB, min 300px, aspect ratio 1:2.5 to 2.5:1.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio. Required when not using start frame or video editing.

multi_prompt.title: Multi Prompt
multi_prompt.description: JSON array of shot definitions for multi-shot mode. Each shot: {"prompt": "...", "duration": N}. Max 6 shots, min duration 1s per shot, total must equal duration. Example: [{"prompt":"A cat jumps","duration":3},{"prompt":"It lands","duration":2}]

generate_audio.title: Generate Audio
generate_audio.description: Generate native audio. Mutually exclusive with reference video.

reference_video.title: Reference Video
reference_video.description: Reference video (.mp4/.mov). Duration 3-10s, resolution 720-2160px per side, max 200MB.

reference_images.title: Reference Images
reference_images.description: Reference images for elements, scenes, or styles. Supports .jpg/.jpeg/.png. Max 7 without video, 4 with video.

keep_original_sound.title: Keep Original Sound
keep_original_sound.description: Keep original sound from reference video.

video_reference_type.description: How to use reference video: 'feature' for style/camera reference, 'base' for video editing.
